attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK troops need to be pulled out of Afganistan! it is not our War! The Taliban are Afganistanis then why are we bothering! They aren't coming over here bothering us, it's not our problem! We are losing our loved one in this arrogant War! 
Death total by year; 2002-3 2003-0 2004-1 2005-1 2006-39 2007-42 2008-51 2009-83

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
